snippet.title: Bishoujo Battle Hanafuda Koi-Koi Gameplay Movie
snippet.description:
This is a gameplay movie of Bishoujo Battle Hanafuda Koi-Koi developed by Zoo Games. 

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1301470/Bishoujo_Battle_Hanafuda_KoiKoi/

The Bishoujo girls from "Rick G Earth" mobile military turn-based strategy game from Japan are here! And they want to play Koi-Koi, the most famous Japanese flower card game with you.

◆Optimized for Hanafuda Beginners
Even if you have never played with hanafuda (flower cards from Japan), play through the easy-to-follow tutorial and learn the basic rules of Koi-Koi, the most popular hanafuda game in Japan.

◆ Multiplayer support!
For an even greater challenge, hop onto the multiplayer mode to play against players from all over the world. Find out how you rank against the Koi-Koi masters.


◇Check out more information
Sticky Rice Games (PR Agent for Zoo Corporation)
https://stickyricegames.com/games/
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/StickyRiceGames
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/StickyRiceGames
